titles.title: A resolution commending the University of Minnesota Duluth Bulldogs for winning the 2002-2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I National Collegiate Women's Ice Hockey Championship.
A resolution commending the University of Minnesota Duluth Bulldogs for winning the 2002-2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I National Collegiate Women's Ice Hockey Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as passed Senate

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on April 3, 2003. However, because action occurred on the measure, the summary has been expanded.)Commends the University of Minnesota-Duluth Women's Ice Hockey Team for winning the 2003 NCAA Division I National Collegiate Women's Ice Hockey Championship.Recognizes the achievements of all the team's players, coaches, and support staff, and invites them to the U.S. Capitol to be honored.Requests that the President: (1) recognize the achievements of the team; and (2) invite them to the White House for an appropriate ceremony.
